subject: Re: transpose/reshape wide dataset to long and vice versa
body:
On 6/5/07, sgallagh@mail.med.upenn.edu  wrote:

> I have searched CPAN and google and the list to the best of my ability
> for any hints related to transposing a "long" dataset to a "wide" dataset
> and vice versa. I assume I am missing an obvious solution to what I
> presume is a common dilemma?

A "long" dataset sounds like data that hasn't been stored into a good
database yet. From a suitable database, you can pull out data in
whatever form you need. Is that it?

Cheers!

--Tom Phoenix
Stonehenge Perl Training

--
